travel.title: Urugendo
travel.click: KANDA HANO KUGIRA NGO UBONE AMAKURU YOSE
travel.text1: Twateguye amahitamo meza y'aho uba kugira ngo ugume neza. Kanda hepfo kugira ngo urebe kandi ufate umwanya. Ariko niba ushaka gufata umwanya mbere, nyamuneka uzuza ifishi ya RSVP kandi tuzakwihagararira.
travel.text2: Kanda hano kugira ngo urebe Ifishi ya RSVP

registry.title: Urutonde rw'Ibintu by'Ubukwe
registry.text: Urukundo rwanyu, isengesho zanyu, kuba muri twese ku bukwe bwacu bisobanura cyane kuri twe... muri ukuri ni impano nziza cyane turashobora gusaba.
registry.text1: Niba ushaka kuduha umusanzu mu gihe dutangira uru rugendo rwiza hamwe, twaba twishimiye cyane.

HowWeMet_Paragraph: Dusanze urukundo mu hantu tutekerezaga... Ubushinwa. Mu gihe cy'icyorezo cya COVID-19, amahirwe yahuriranye Arnold na Haven mu gihe bari baba mu majyepfo y'Ubushinwa. Nubwo bazaga kubera impamvu zitandukanye, inzira zabo zahuriranye bitunguranye... binyuze ku munywanyi babasangiye. Icyo gihe, Haven yakoraga nk'umwigisha w'icyongereza i Shenzhen, mu gihe Arnold yigaga informatique i Guangzhou. Nubwo hari intera hagati y'imigi, bumvise umubano uhita kandi batangira kubaka ubucuti bwihuse burahinduka ikindi kintu cyimbitse. Nyuma y'amezi atanu bavuye bahuye, batangiye gukundana ku mugaragaro. Kuva mu ntangiriro, Arnold yari afite ibyiyumviro bikomeye kuri Haven, abwira inshuti ze ati, 'Ni umugore wo kubana.' Haven yakuwaga n'ibiganiro bya Arnold byubaka no mu buryo yari amushishikariza gutekereza no gukura.
BuildingLifeTogether_Paragraph:
Mu 2002, umwaka umwe nyuma yo gutangira umubano wabo, Haven yumvise ahamagarirwa gusubira muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe. Yaretse akazi, yimukiye mu nzu ye, kandi yaguze amatike yose y'indege atatu. Ariko mu byabaye bidasubirwaho, ntashoboje kuzamuka muri rimwe muri ayo. Byaragaragaye ko Imana ifite gahunda zikurikiyeho. Adafite andi hantu aho ajya, yagarutse i Guangzhou‚Äîumurwa wa Arnold.

Arnold yamuhagarariwe igihe cyose, atanga inkunga mu gihe yarimo agatangaje ibice bya visa, impapuro, n'urugendo mu migi myinshi kugira ngo abone inyandiko. Amaherezo, Haven yasanze akandi kazi ko kwigisha i Guangzhou, bikamufungurira inzira zo kuba hafi kandi bakomeza umubano wabo.

Hamwe, bakoresheje neza igihe cyabo. Bazenguruye Ubushinwa, bagiiye kureba filime hamwe, bumvaga umuziki, bagerageza ibiryo bishya, kandi bagikundagurutsa inzira ndende mu murwa. Basekaga n'incuti, bareba imikino ya NBA, imikino ya Premier League kandi basporaga hamwe. Bajyaga mu rusengero, bubaka umuryango, kandi bakora umwirondoro wari nk'urugo.

Hanyuma muri Gashyantare 2023, ubuzima bwahindutse. Haven yimukiye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika‚Äîiki gihe yimukiye i Washington, D.C. mu gihe Arnold yasubiye mu Bugande nyuma y'imyaka umunani mu Bushinwa. Icyiciro cy'intera ndende cyatangiye. Nubwo bari intera n'uturere, bavuganye buri munsi, hirya no hino mu turere n'imigabane. Ku gihe kimwe, Haven ari i Seattle kandi Arnold akiri i Guangzhou, barabyemeje itandukaniro ry'amasaha 15 ariko ntibigeze bihagarara guhagararana.
TheProposal_Paragraph:
Hanyuma haje ikintu cyiza cyane.

Mu iherezo rya 2023, Haven yari afite akazi mu Kenya, igihugu cyari gifite akamaro ku bwa Arnold. Yari amaze gufata icyemezo ko Kenya ari ho yazasaba Heaven kubana.

Ku wa 15 Ukuboza 2023, Arnold yasabye. Byari gutunguranye byibuze kuri Haven, wavuze yego anyereka amarira n'ibyishimo. Yari yarasengeye umugabo nka Arnold, kandi muri icyo gihe, yabonye izo sengesho zisubirwa.

Kuva icyo gihe, bakomeje kugenda hamwe, ukuboko ku kuboko, nubwo ubuzima bukomeza guhinduka. Heaven yatangiye igice gishya i Washington, D.C. kandi Arnold yatangiye gahunda yo kwiga kugira ngo akure mu kazi. Hamwe, bahangane n'inzibacyuho, intera, n'ibitazwi ariko ntibigeze bigira wenyine.

Baha Imana icyubahiro cyose, kuko yaba urufatiro rw'umubano wabo. Ni ihangane ryayo, imbaraga, n'ubuntu byabakomeje mu myaka ibiri y'urukundo rw'intera kandi bikomeza kubayobora muri iki cyiciro gikurikiyeho, kuruhande.

theme.verse: Nubwo umwe ashobora gutsindwa, babiri bashobora kwirwanaho. Umugozi w'imirongo itatu ntushobora kucibwa vuba.
theme.title: Umugozi w'Imirongo Itatu
theme.subtitle: Bahujwe n'Urukundo, Bakomeye n'Imana

accommodation.title: Aho Uba ku Mushitsi w'Ubukwe Bwacu
accommodation.subtitle: Turishimiye cyane kwakira abakunzi bacu baturuka ku isi yose
accommodation.welcome: Turishimiye cyane kwakira abakunzi bacu baturutse muri Amerika, Uburayi, U Rwanda, no mu Bugande bwose kugira ngo twizihe ubukwe bwacu hamwe!

luxury.title: Amahoteri muri Kampala
luxury.subtitle: Niba ushaka gutuza, ubwiza, n'umuntu wo mu rwego rwo hejuru, turasaba amahoteri akurikira:

latitude.description: Hoteri nziza ya boutique ireba Ikiyaga Victoria, ihuza igishushanyo cya kijyambere hamwe n'ubuntu bw'Ubugande. Byiza ku bashyitsi bakunda ubuhanzi, gutuza, n'ibikoresho byiza.

lePetit.description: Ubuntu bw'Abafaransa mu buryo butuje. Iyi hoteri ifite spa, piscine, n'ibiryo byiza - byiza ku bashyitsi bashaka gutura neza kandi neza.

sheraton.description: Ikirango cya Marriott cy'isi yose gitanga ibyumba byiza, piscine yo hejuru, kandi hafi y'amaresitora meza yo hagati ya Kampala n'amaduka.

protea.description: Iherereye ku musozi wa Naguru hamwe n'amashusho yiza y'umurwa, iyi hoteri izwi cyane ku bipimo byayo byo hejuru, igishushanyo cya kijyambere, kandi hafi y'ibintu byinshi by'umurwa.

hotel360.description: Aho tuzakora ubukwe bwacu nabwo dutanga aho uba gutuza. Abashyitsi baba hano bazishimira aho bari aho ibirori bizabera, bakikijwe n'amashusho yiza y'Umusozi wa Ndejje.
hotel360.discount: üéÅ Igitekerezo cyihariye: Twabonye igabanuka rya 8% kuri buri cyumba ku bashyitsi bose b'ubukwe buba muri Hoteri 360¬∞ mu cyumweru cy'ubukwe.
hotel360.rooms: Hoteri ifite ibyumba 30 byose, rero uko tuduhamagara vuba, uko tuza kukwifashako neza kugumana aho uba.

house.type: Inzu ya Airbnb ikwiye imiryango cyangwa amatsinda

guesthouses.type: Ibyumba bihendutse kandi biganirwa hafi hafi, hagati ya minuty 10-20 z'aho ubukwe buzabera

travelTip.title: Inama y'Urugendo
travelTip.content: Niba ugenda mu ndege, ahantu uzagera ni Ikibuga cy'indege mpuzamahanga cya Entebbe (EBB) ‚Äî hafi ya minoti 45-60 kuva Kampala bitewe n'imodoka.
travelTip.recommendation: Turasaba kugumana aho uba vuba kandi ukadumenyesha aho uzaba kugira ngo dushobore guhuza amahitamo y'ingendo hafi y'itariki y'ubukwe.

closing.excitement: Ntidushobora gutegereza kwizihiza uyu munsi wihariye hamwe na mwe!

travelGuide.title: Ubuyobozi bw'Urugendo n'Abasura
travelGuide.subtitle: Muduhere muri Kampala, Ubugande
travelGuide.date: Ku wa 14 Gashyantare 2026 ‚Ä¢ Ibintu byose ukeneye kumenya kugira ngo ugire urugendo rutazibagirana

welcome.title: Turishimiye cyane kubakira!
welcome.description2: kubera impamvu nziza - abantu bari bakire cyane, ikirere cyiza, kandi ntidushobora gutegereza gusangira aka hantu kihariye na mwe.
welcome.description3: Haba murimo guhaguruka mu mahanga cyangwa mugendera kuva mu gihugu kiri hafi, dufite ibintu byose mukeneye kugira ngo urugendo rwawe rube rworoheje kandi rushimishije.

visa.title: Visa n'Ibisabwa kugira ngo Winjire
visa.subtitle: Kugera mu Bugande byoroshye kuruta uko ubitekereza! Hitamo icyerekezo gikugirira neza.

eastAfrican.title: Ku bashyitsi b'Iburasirazuba bw'Afurika
eastAfrican.req2: Zana gusa pasiporo yawe cyangwa ikarita y'indangamuntu

ugandaTourist.title: Visa y'Umukerarugendo w'Ubugande
ugandaTourist.req1: Igiciro: $50 USD kugira ngo winjire rimwe

eastAfricanTourist.title: Visa y'Umukerarugendo w'Iburasirazuba bw'Afurika
eastAfricanTourist.req3: Kwinjira mu Bugande, Kenya na Rwanda
eastAfricanTourist.req4: Byiza kugira ngo uhurize safari, kureba ingagi n'ubukwe!

applicationTips.title: Inama zo Gusaba Visa
applicationTips.tip1: Pasiporo ikora amezi 6+ nyuma y'itariki y'urugendo
applicationTips.tip2: Itike yo gusubira cyangwa kugenda imbere rirasabwa
applicationTips.tip3: Amakuru y'aho uba (kanda kugira ngo urebe amahitamo)

cta.title: Witeguye Gusaba Visa Yawe?
cta.description: Tangira gusaba visa yawe kuri interineti ubu. Uburyo bworoshye kandi burumvikana!
cta.portal: visas.immigration.go.ug - Urubuga Rwa Leta rw'Ubujyanama bw'Ubugande

health.title: Ibisabwa mu buzima
health.noteText: Baza muganga wawe ibyumweru 4-6 mbere y'urugendo kugira ngo uhabwe inama z'ubuzima bwite n'urukingo rukenewe.

flight.title: Kuguruka kuri Ikibuga cy'indege cya Entebbe
flight.item2: Kilometre 40 kuva Kampala (isaha imwe mu modoka)
flight.tipText: Imodoka zishobora kuba nyinshi mu masaha yo kuri akazi (7-10 mu gitondo, 5-8 nimugoroba)

bus.title: Abisi kuva U Rwanda/Kenya
bus.item4: Guhaguruka: Parike ya Bisi ya Nyabugogo
bus.tipText: Fata amatike mbere mu gihe cy'ibihe byinshi

apps.title: Porogaramu z'Ingenzi zo Gukuramo
apps.subtitle: Zikuremo mbere yo kugera kugira ngo ukorere byoroshye!

atm.title: ATM n'Ihana
atm.forex: Ibiciro byiza byo guhana amafaranga mu biro byo guhana amafaranga muri Kampala
atm.atmText: ATM ziraboneka hose (Stanbic & Standard Chartered byasabwe)

tipping.title: Gutanga Impamvu
tipping.text: 10% mu maresitora niba igihombo cy'uburyo budakoreshejwe

items.repellent: Ikintu gikingira udukoko hamwe na DEET

cultural.title: Inama z'Umuco
cultural.subtitle: Gusobanukirwa imigenzo y'ahantu bizagufasha guhuza n'ubushyuhe bw'umuco w'Ubugande

tips.greetings: Kuramutsa birakomeye - fata igihe cyo kuramutsa abantu neza
tips.time: Igihe cy'Ubugande - ibirori bikunze gutangira mu minota 30-60 bitinze
tips.photos: Buri gihe saba mbere yo gufotora abantu
tips.language: Wiga Oli otya? (Amakuru yawe?) mu Luganda
tips.warmth: Abanyougande bari bakire cyane kandi bakinira!

safety.title: Kuguma Ufite Umutekano kandi Ufite Ubuzima

tips.safe: Muri rusange birafite umutekano - Kampala irakira abasura
tips.valuables: Koresha amakofre y'amahoteri ku bintu byagaciro, wirinde imitako igaragara
tips.pharmacies: Amaduka y'imiti yuzuye mu murwa wose

foodWater.title: Umutekano w'Ibiryo n'Amazi
foodWater.restaurants: Amaresitora y'amahoteri afite umutekano; hitamo amastand y'ibiryo by'umuhanda arimo abantu benshi
foodWater.rolex: Gerageza Rolex (chapati hamwe n'amagi) - ibiryo by'umuhanda Ubugande bukunda!

personalNote.title: Ubutumwa Bwihariye Buturuka Kuri Twe
personalNote.text1: Abantu bari bakire cyane, ikirere cyiza, kandi ntidushobora gutegereza gusangira aka hantu kihariye na mwe.
personalNote.text2: Ntimuhanganye niba ibintu byose bisa nkibintu bishya - Abanyubugande bafasha kandi benshi bavuga icyongereza. Tuzatunganya no gukora ibikorwa mu matsinda ku bashyitsi bo mu mahanga kugira ngo dushakashe hamwe!
personalNote.questions: Ibibazo ku rugendo? Turi hano kugira ngo dufashe!
